stories.original_headline: Scientists solve a major roadblock holding back cancer cell therapy
stories.original_summary: Researchers have found a reliable way to grow helper T cells from stem cells, solving a major challenge in immune-based cancer therapy. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover New Way to Boost Body's Spirit Guardians
stories.fantasy_story: The Circle of Wise Wizards has found a potent new method to cultivate the body's hidden spirit guardians from primal life essences. These tiny protectors, once rare, can now be nurtured in great numbers. They will strengthen the body's natural wards, helping to banish blights and defend against dark humors that weaken folk.

stories.original_summary: Scientists at Stanford Medicine have discovered a treatment that can reverse cartilage loss in aging joints and even prevent arthritis after knee injuries. stories.fantasy_headline: Healers Find Potion to Restore Joint Cushions, Banish Stiffness
stories.fantasy_story: A dedicated group of healers and alchemists has unearthed a remarkable elixir that can reverse the wearing away of joint cushions. This potent draught can even prevent the dreaded stiffening curse after grievous injuries. By blocking a weakening essence, the remedy brings back healthy, flexible joints, making movement easy once more.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Finest Whispering Shells for Scrying Glass Holders
stories.fantasy_story: For those who possess the famed Scrying Glass, the Applecrafters' Guild presents their enchanted whispering shells. These remarkable sound-catchers offer unique enchantments that work best, and sometimes only, with the Scrying Glass. Whether replacing old trinkets or acquiring new ones, many prefer these finely crafted listening devices.
